    <h2 class="contentHeader">2015 Valley Thunder</h2>
    
    <div class='widget'  style='border:1px solid #000080;'><p>Valley Thunder Soccer Club was established to provide youth in the Lewis/Clark Valley an opportunity to play soccer at an advanced level. We have put together a coaching staff of very dedicated men and women who are strictly here for the kids and to help them develop into young student athletes. Our goal is to prepare these young men and young women to have the confidence to play at the next level with dedication, determination, and drive.</p></div><div class='widget'><div>Spring Season</div><ul><li>Games for all teams start March 14th</li></ul></div><div class='widget'  style='border:1px solid #000080;'><p><center><b>Coaches Education</b></center>In December Brian Skinner got his Level 6 coaching license. Congratulations to Bryan. <br />Any coaches or parents that would like to get information on upcoming education please let your coaches know and we can get information out to you.</p></div>

    <script type="text/javascript" src="scripts/find-position.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        function navOnClick(what) {/*page url to anchor in div url*/
            window.location.href = what.childNodes[1].childNodes[1].href;
        }

        function Setbg(what, bg,color) {
            what.style.background = bg;

            what.style.backgroundImage = 'url("images/soccerbullet.png")';
            what.style.backgroundRepeat = 'no-repeat'
            what.style.backgroundPosition = 'top right'; 
            what.childNodes[0].style.color = color;
        }

        function dynNavItmOver(what) {
            what.className = 'dynNavItmOver';
        }
        function dynNavItmDefault(what) {
            what.className = 'dynNavItmDefault';
        }

        function showNavigation(what) {
            what.className = 'navBackgroundDefault';
            var menuId = 'dynNav' + what.childNodes[1].childNodes[1].innerHTML;
            var menu = document.getElementById(menuId);
            menu.style.display = 'block';
            menu.style.position = 'absolute';
            menu.style.top = ((FindTop(what) + 50) + 'px');
            menu.style.left = ((FindLeft(what) -8)+ 'px');
        }

        function hideNavigation(what) {
            what.className = 'navBackgroundDefault';
            var menuId = 'dynNav' + what.childNodes[1].childNodes[1].innerHTML;
            var menu = document.getElementById(menuId);
            menu.style.display = 'none';
        }
        
    </script>
